channel.title: CVE Feed for SAP SE -- SAP S/4 HANA (Fiori UI for General Ledger Accounting)
channel.description: The latest CVEs for SAP SE -- SAP S/4 HANA (Fiori UI for General Ledger Accounting)

item.title: CVE-2020-6273|2024-08-04T08:55:22.195Z -- sap%20se -- sap%20s%2F4%20hana%20%28fiori%20ui%20for%20general%20ledger%20accounting%29
item.description: SAP S/4 HANA (Fiori UI for General Ledger Accounting), versions 103, 104, does not perform necessary authorization checks for an authenticated user working with attachment service, allowing the attacker to delete attachments due to Missing Authorization Check.
